article_title: Rising hospital costs prompt mental health review in Sacramento County
article_text: Sacramento County has seen a big increase in psychiatric hospital costs. The jump has prompted the county to re-examine its services. A plan is expected in three months.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Mental health, Sacramento County, Public Eye
